title: Cops prevent protestors from building platform at GotaGoGama
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A group of protestors were disrupted by the Police when they attempted to construct a platform at GotaGoGama today (01).
Police were seen standing near the protestors who wrre attempting to build the structure around early morning today (01).
Earlier, a heated situation also arose at MynaGoGama when Police reportedly attacked a protestor in front of Temple Trees.
